author: dgaudet
msg: errno reporting cleanup.  popenf, pclosef, spawn_child all return valid errno.

author: brian
msg: Added pointer to freeware product which does this as a loadable kernel module.

author: dgaudet
msg: Add documentation for DNS issues (reliability and security), and try
to explain the virtual host matching process.
Try to continue gracefully by disabling the vhost if a DNS lookup
fails while parsing the configuration file.
